item.title: Python
item.description: Python is a programming language which can be used for more general data science whereas R is used mainly for statistical analysis. Hereâ€™s a little bit about me in a python code. #code for python alisha_dict = { 'firstName': 'Alisha', 'lastName': 'Nayak', 'hobbies': ['movies','reading','crocheting/knitting', 'soccer', 'Animal Crossing'], 'occupation': ['student'], 'age': 21 } print(alisha_dict) ## {'firstName': 'Alisha', 'lastName': 'Nayak', 'hobbies': ['movies', 'reading', 'crocheting/knitting', 'soccer', 'Animal Crossing'], 'occupation': ['student'], 'age': 21} We can also use python to adjust text to make it easier to read.
